trap.title: Server main loop
trap.intro:
A select inside a for is a common idiom for receiving various events in a loop.
This code wants to find the 3 smallest positive integers that are multiples of 17 and 38. What does it print?
trap.discussion: Using break here does not exit the for loop, it exits the select block. This is counterintuitive because there is no possible fallthrough between cases in a select.
